title: The Layers of Grievance Studies: With Mike Nayna and James Lindsay
description:
I was able to sit down with grievance studies scholar James Lindsay and documentary film maker Mike Nayna. We speak about postmodernism in the academy, and applied post modernism "in the wild," as seen in the events at Evergreen. We explore the question "what does this mean for our society"

Listen to the podcast version here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/The-Layers-of-Grievance-Studies-With-Mike-Nayna-and-James-Lindsay-e43b91

You can watch Mike's 3 part documentary of Evergreen (not the Grievance studies doc, that is still in production) here:
Part One: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FH2WeWgcSMk

follow Mike and Jim on twitter @MikeNayna and @ConceptualJames

Follow me here:

twitter: @theother_95
Instagram: @theother95
Facebook: @theother95page
Email me: theotherninetyfive@gmail.com
